summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeYour lips have never tasted so sweet with Lanolips Raspberry Shortcake 101 Ointment Multi-Balm. The iconic Lanolips Original 101 Ointment has been sugar-coated, creating a hydrating sweet treat for your lips.
details: DetailsBenefitsTreat your lips with a burst of sweet, tangy raspberries with rich buttery short cake lip goodness with the new 101 Ointment Multi-Balm Raspberry Shortcake.This super rich, 100% natural lip balm penetrates and seals in moisture to give extreme hydration for extremely dry and chapped lips.Apply it to dry cuticles/cracked heels/dry nasal passages. Melt it into your own moisturizer to supercharge it. Mix a tiny bit with your foundation for a natural, dewy look. Keep eyebrows in place. Apply to windburn/cold-chapped cheeks. Heal dry/brittle nails, paper cuts, insect bites.FeaturesFemale-Owned Beauty BrandTSA-Approved, travel friendly beauty productCruelty-FreeVegetarian100% NaturalFormulated WithoutArtificial ColorParabensPEGsMineral OilItem 2621684How To UseWarm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips & skin. Use generously. Keep below 25°C / 77°F.For external use only.IngredientsLanolin*, Aroma (Nat)*, Tocopherol (Vit E), Glycine Soja Oil*, Cinnamal* *Naturally Derived/*Dérivé Naturelle.
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips & skin. Use generously. Keep below 25°C / 77°F.For external use only.

reviews.headline: Best lip balm ever
reviews.comments: Truly the best lip balm I've ever used!

reviews.headline: Yum
reviews.comments: The scent is amazinggg, I just wish it was a teeny bit thinner so it would be easier to apply

reviews.headline: lip balm
reviews.comments: pefect keeps my lips hydrated

reviews.headline: NEW OBSESSION
reviews.comments: I was inspired to try Lanolips after watching a creator on TikTok rave about these. Purchasing Lanolips was one of the best decisions I've ever made. While I did find the applicator a bit messy, the product went far beyond my expectations. It applied smoothly and had a thick formula that immediatley hydrated my lips. It also smells absolutely fabulous. I would reccomend Lanolips to anybody and everybody and I can't wait to buy every scent/flavor.

reviews.headline: My favorite!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite lanolips scent! Makes my lips super soft and shiny!

reviews.headline: Absolutely amazing!
reviews.comments: Smells fantastic. Leaves your lips hydrated.

reviews.headline: A must have
reviews.comments: This is one of my all time favorite lip products. I always have a tube in my bag because it's great for applying on the go. The raspberry shortcake flavor reminds me of a cupcake

reviews.headline: Too cute!
reviews.comments: I can't get over how cute and nostalgic the packaging is and don't even get me started on the scent! It smells like childhood and it's perfect for any gourmand girlie. Of course the hydrating aspect is great too and it's multi use so you can use it for other things if you're not in the market for a new lippie.

reviews.headline: So moisturizing!
reviews.comments: I use this mostly as a lip balm and it is so moisturizing for my dry lips! It smells delicious too and is super smooth.

reviews.headline: So moisturizing!
reviews.comments: I use this mostly as a lip balm and it is so moisturizing for my dry lips! It smells delicious too and is super smooth.

reviews.headline: Super sweet take on the OG Lanolips!
reviews.comments: The raspberry shortcake flavour of Lanolips 101 Ointment literally smells and tastes like dessert. Such a fun twist on one of my favourite lip products of all time!

reviews.headline: Not This Scent
reviews.comments: I absolutely LOVE the lanolips balms; however, this scent/flavor is awful. Tastes and smells like chewable strawberry medicine. Along with that, the consistency of this one was completely different from my other ones, it was super thin and oily.

reviews.headline: I Love This Product!
reviews.comments: I love the Lanolips Raspberry Shortcake 101 Ointment Multi-Balm! It smells delicious and feels amazing on my lips. It is so nourishing and non-sticky. It always helps my lips when they are dry and chapped. I like to use it as a lip mask at night.

reviews.headline: yummy and moisturizing
reviews.comments: i love this balm, its soo moisturizing and easy to apply once warmed a little bit (if its too cold its a bit hard but if you keep it in your pocket it its warmed nice) the scent reminds me of cake its yummy

reviews.headline: Very Impressed
reviews.comments: I have a very bad habit of biting my lips and this is by far the best lip balm that I have tried. The texture of my lips has noticeably improved after only a few days. It is extremely hydrating and long lasting. I am overall pleased with this product and want to try Lanolip's other flavors!

reviews.headline: Doesn't taste like strawberries
reviews.comments: I love Lanolips, I am a die hard fan. This product works great and doesn't ever dry my lips out. It tastes good, but it's more like a caramel coffee or caramel ice cream flavor than strawberries. I don't like caramel so that's why the three stars.

reviews.headline: A sheep's fat was used to make this product
reviews.comments: I didn't realize this product exploited individual's for their wool and fat, so I returned it. -1000 aura points

reviews.headline: Love!!!
reviews.comments: Super moitsurizing, not sticky at all. The scent is not overpowering and just enough. Doesnt smell super artificial. I would buy this lip balm a million times over again, I recommend it to everyone

reviews.headline: Vaseline + Rhode
reviews.comments: the inbetween of lip products imo, its moisturizing, lasts a bit, not overwhelming scent, good size, only con is a lil pressure to push out

reviews.headline: Cure for bad cuticles
reviews.comments: After letting my gels grow out and then moving, my nails and cuticles were shot. I picked this up after reading reviews online and OMG.  This stuff is the best if you are hard on your nails and cuticles. I rubbed a small amount on my nails and cuticles at night before I went sleep and after only a few days I could see the difference. Oh - and it smells amazing.

faceoff_positive.comments: For me personally, both glossier balm dot com and summer Fridays were not notable in any way. Balm dot com actually dries my lips out. I tried lanolips, and now have 4 tubes. I wear it all day! Both the 101 Multibalm and the lip treatments they have are amazing—the lip treatment products are just a little more spreadable. I use the Lemonade lip treatment mostly at night, let it sink in, and then put the Lawless forget the filler lip mask over it—so amazing! The multibalm is thick but not sticky, and lasts forever. Makes my lips look hydrated and smooth. I recommend exfoliating lips and then putting it on in AM. I also put lip gloss over it (the 101 multibalm) and it all lasts for hours! I am a huge fan, and I've never found a lip product I love like this.
faceoff_positive.headline: Better than glossier and summer Fridays

faceoff_negative.comments: I ordered this because I LOVE Lanolips and wanted to try the new flavors but I'm so disappointed in this one. I'm not sure if I got a bad batch because it has so many good reviews on here but it's super thin and barely lasts, the other ointments last all day long and are super thick! I would recommend sticking with the other flavors.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not like the other flavors
